text: Hi everyone! i would like to import blog posts into HubSpot. The problem is that i get an error "[Line: 409, Column: 1]; Cannot build WordpressBlog, some of required attributes are not set [channel]". Does anyone know what the problem is? i don´t know which required attributes are missing.

Gotta wipe a whole HS blog and re-import all of the blog posts.
Anyone got a good way to bulk delete everything in a blog?
In the past I’ve deleted the blog itself and recreated it. Just wondering if anyone’s got a faster more lazy way.
MAJOR ISSUE with a client their sites are being blocked by google Anyone else running into this issue on blog posts. hs/hsstatic/AsyncSupport/static-1.58/js/rss_listing_asset.js

At the risk of coming off a little spammy, just making sure everyone here got the chance to see - we have opened up RSVPs for the Developer Community Event.

Presentations, Announcements, Beer, and Developers. It’s gonna be awesome.
:wave:  Anyone know an easy way to migrate ~30 WP Gravity Forms -> HubSpot Forms?
A customer is trying to migration and wants to avoid 2 hours of copy/pasting :upside_down_face:
Sometimes, it takes longer to look for a solution

Hey all!  I have some dynamically generated e-mails that go out to clients (generated in python) - many (most) of them go out to people already in my HubSpot portal.  I'd love to be able to include tracking code in the e-mails.  Is there a way to do this without using the transactional e-mail capability?
not an exact solution but this is how we fixed it - the xml file we imported in wordpress and then exported them again and it works :tada:
we can create a plugin, and using `HubSpot forms api` we can create HubSpot Forms.
